sentences.en: An initial fee is payable to the franchiser.
sentences.cn: 应该付给经销商一笔先期费用.

sentences.en: Coca-Cola, Pepsi and Cadbury use franchisers to manufacture, bottle and distribute their products within geographical areas.
sentences.cn: 可口可乐、百事可乐和吉百利公司利用特许经销商在一定的地区内生产、罐装和销售其产品。

sentences.en: I want to take some sample to show our franchiser.
sentences.cn: 我要带一些样品回去给我们的经销商们看看.

trans.tran_en: A franchiser is an organization which sells franchises
